snippet: John J. Farmer Jr., the dean of Rutgers School of Law-Newark since 2009, will replace John B. Wolf, who resigned last week amid a basketball scandal.
abstract: Rutgers University names John J Farmer Jr as senior vice president and general counsel; appointment comes amid scandal about Mike Rice, men's basketball coach fired for abusive language and physical aggression against student players; Farmer replaces John B Wolf, who resigned along with athletic director Tim Pernetti.
lead_paragraph: John J. Farmer Jr., the dean of Rutgers School of Law-Newark since 2009, will replace John B. Wolf, who resigned last week amid a basketball scandal.

headline.seo: John J. Farmer Jr. Named Senior Vice President at Rutgers
headline.main: Rutgers Names Replacement for Counsel Who Resigned
headline.print_headline: Rutgers Names Replacement For Counsel Who Resigned

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
